name: MongoDB Enterprise V-81869
title: The DoD standard for authentication is DoD-approved PKI certificates.
script:
CAFile="CAFile"
allowInvalidCerts="allowInvalidCertificates"
checkfile="/etc/mongod.conf"
if [ -f $checkfile ]
then
    log=$(grep -i "${CAFile}" "${checkfile}" | grep -Ev "#")
    if [ -z "$log" ]
    then
       echo "Can't find $CAFile within $checkfile"
       exit 1
    else
       invalidCerts=$(grep -i "${allowInvalidCerts}" "${checkfile}")
       if [ -i "$invalidCerts" ]
       then
          echo "$allowInvalidCerts does not exist within $checkfile"
          exit 0
       else
          echo "$allowInvalidCerts exist within $checkfile"
          exit 1
       fi
    fi
else
    echo "$checkfile does not exist"
    exit 1
fi
